title: How to Make Coffee Cream

steps.headline: Add the desired amount of coffee (and/or coffee essence) to the cream and stir it until it's dissolved.
Use a whisk or electric hand beater and beat the mixture until it becomes firm.

text: Add the desired amount of coffee (and/or coffee essence) to the cream and stir it until it's dissolved.  Add sugar to sweeten.  Use a whisk or electric hand beater and beat the mixture until it becomes firm.  Finished.
